description:
It`s December, and winter is finally upon all the students. The practical exam at the end of the semester will be a tournament, and Lion`s first match is against Nina. Meanwhile, Nina is becoming more and more flustered about figuring about how she can prove herself to ALCA to make her way back. Holding her frustrations in her heart, she heads towards the exam, but what results will she find?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Namida wa Ore no Tame Narazu
Our Tears Are Not for Our Own Benefit
